title: Magnitude and direction of electric force

content.question: Object A and object B are separated by distance d. Object A has charge +q, and object B has charge -2q. Object A has a force of magnitude F exerted on it by object B. What are the magnitude and direction of the force exerted on object B?

choices.label: Magnitude Direction F/2 Away from object A
Magnitude Direction F Away from object A
Magnitude Direction 2F Away from object A
Magnitude Direction F Toward object A

content.answer: Magnitude Direction F Toward object A

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
